title: Report Open Electrical Pedestal
description: A resident reports that a green electrical box (pedestal) in their front yard is open, with wires exposed.

tasks.description: Advise the caller to keep a safe distance and not to touch the pedestal.
Get the exact location of the open pedestal.
Create a high-priority service order for a crew to immediately go and secure the pedestal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent dispatches a crew to address the public safety hazard.
